_sText:
**I've modified De_Dust2 to test my new gamemode, it was so good ... then i decided to continue...**

Bored of low player speed, and prefer a Quake-Like gameplay ?

this gamemode is for you ! 

**FAQ :**

-----------------------------------------
**Q**: What does this gamemode ?

**A**: in my new gamemode, the player start with 200hp, his speed and jump are increased by 50%, and you can wear 2 he/smokegrenade at a time like the Flashbang.

-----------------------------------------

**Q**: Why "**HS_**dust2" ?

**A**: HS because my map is really "hardcore", then i decided to call it HARDCORE-STRIKE_DUST2

-----------------------------------------

**Q**: Can i make a map with your gamemode ?

**A**: Not Yet, but i'll add a prefab Later, you can also decompile it. (use my textures too if u make one)

-----------------------------------------

have other questions, or ideas to improve ? ? tell me ^^

HAVE FUN !

---------------------------------------

/!\ **TOO BRIGHTER FOR YOU ?? Use This Version** [hs-dust2-darker](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/88523875/hs_dust2_darker.bsp "") /!\

--------------------------------

**PLEASE READ BEFORE RATING !! Thx**
